entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , North Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:26 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 04:52 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.9°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: N 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of freezing drizzle or rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle changing to periods of freezing drizzle or light snow this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Overcast. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Overcast. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
